ri:Resource.title: Stellar Department of the Astronomical Institute of the Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic

curation.publisher: Stelar Department of Astronomical Institute of the Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic

content.subject: spectra archives
content.description: Stellar Department of the Astronomical Institute of the Czech Republic operates the 2m telescope at Ondrejov observatory and manages archives of middle and high resolution spectra secured by its spectrographs
